name: language-web-component

0.1.0.name: language-web-component
0.1.0.description: Adds syntax highlighting to web component files in Atom (inspired by the language-vue-compnoent package).

readme:
# language-web-component

Syntax highlighting for .web files (html)

*This package is a modified version of the 'language-vue-component' package (https://atom.io/packages/language-vue-component).

**NOTE:** You still need to install corresponding packages for pre-processors (e.g. Jade, SASS, CoffeeScript) to get proper syntax highlighting for them.

metadata.name: language-web-component
metadata.description: Adds syntax highlighting to web component files in Atom (inspired by the language-vue-compnoent package).
